utterances: Doctor, I'm feeling really stressed because I have to attend a conference for work. I've never been to one before and I don't want to make any mistakes.
Yes, that's exactly how I feel. I'm not sure what to expect.
That's a good point. I'll make a checklist and make sure I have everything I need.
That's reassuring. I'll definitely keep that in mind.
Thank you, doctor. Those are all great tips. I feel a lot better now, knowing that I have a plan.
Doctor, I must admit something that's been bothering me lately.
During our last few sessions, I stopped looking at you. It's nothing personal, but I was trying to avoid temptation. I didn't want to be tempted by your good looks and charming personality.
I know, and I didn't want to jeopardize our progress by letting my attraction get in the way.

It's not just one thing, but rather a combination of factors. You're intelligent, caring, and confident, which are all attractive qualities. But I know that we can have a successful therapeutic relationship without crossing any inappropriate lines.
Actually, there is. I feel stressed because I have to attend a conference next week, and I've never been to one before. I want to make a good impression, but I'm not sure what to expect.
Doctor, I've been feeling guilty lately. I started two more wars, and now I feel like I've done something wrong.
Well, I thought they were necessary at the time. But now, looking back, I realize they weren't the best solution.
I decided to end both of the wars. I want to try and make things right.
It's just that I can't shake this feeling of guilt. I feel like I've let people down.
Thank you, Doctor. I just needed to talk this out with someone.
Well, I've been avoiding looking at you during our sessions. It's not because of anything you did; I just don't want to be tempted by your good looks and charming personality.
No, it's not your fault. I'll try to work on it myself.
Doctor, I feel so lonely since my best friend passed away. I don't know how to cope with this.
No, not really. I just spend most of my time alone in my room, thinking about him.
I haven't really thought about that. Do you think it would help?
That sounds like it could help. I just miss my friend so much and it feels like I'll never be able to fill the void he left in my life.
That gives me hope. Thank you, Doctor.
